title: Logotypes using Optima or Zapf Humanist
content:
Hi.  
I need examples of logotypes or whole CI using the Optima  
or Zapf Humanist 601 fonts.  
Will be gratefull for any suggestions.  
Best regards,  
Marcin Petrus
author: marcinpetrus

comments.content:
Hi Marcin,

a similar question has been raised recently by Stewf, check out [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418201348/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43436#comment-267825) (starting w/ comments from 22.Mar.2008 11.40am et seqq.)

Another one that came to my mind: the drugstore chain [Rossmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418201348/http:/www.rossmann.de/) (based in Germany; also branches in Poland, Czech Republic & Hungary)

Also:  
 [Fonts in use](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418201348/http:/www.linotype.com/fontsinuse-o.html) at Linotype.com  
F
Walk through the personal care products aisle in the local drugstore.

Delcourt publishing (france), abama, herbert brown, campbells soups, stendhal cosmetics, akmerkez (istanbul), off the top of my head.

dr
